verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a truth older than the ages
There is a promise of things yet to come
There is one, born for our salvation
Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is a light that overwhelms the darkness
There is a kingdom that forever reigns
There is freedom from the chains that bind us
Jesus, Jesus

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Who walks on the waters
Who speaks to the sea
Who stands in the fire beside me
He roars like a lion
He bled as the lamb
He carries my healing in his hands
Jesus

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There is a name I call in times of trouble
There is a song that comforts in the night
There is a voice that calms the storm that rages
He is Jesus, Jesus

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Who walks on the waters
Who speaks to the sea
Who stands in the fire beside me
He roars like a lion
He bled as the lamb
He carries my healing in his hands
Jesus

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Messiah, my Saviour
There is power in Your name
You're my rock and, my redeemer
There is power in Your name
In Your name

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
You walk on the waters
You speak to the sea
You stand in the fire beside me
You roar like a lion
You bled as the lamb
You carry my healing in Your hands

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
God, you walk on the waters
You speak to the sea
You stand in the fire beside me
You roar like a lion
You bled as the lamb
You carry my healing in Your hands
Jesus

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
There is no one like you
Jesus
There is no one like you
